entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:48 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 7:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
